description: Lists the drafts in the user's mailbox.

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://mail.google.com/` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
The user's email address. The special value `me` can be used to indicate the authenticated user.
Include drafts from `SPAM` and `TRASH` in the results.
Maximum number of drafts to return. This field defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500.
Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.
Only return draft messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, `"from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid: is:unread"`.
